entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
